item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 4, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Combining 15s interval whole-sky-camera photos to form a 4y spanning keogram (247 points | 47 comments)
2. ELKS: Linux for 16-bit Intel Processors (9 points | discuss)
3. A Return to Polymathy (2015) [pdf] (60 points | 14 comments)

6. One Dog vs. the Windows 3.1 Graphics Stack (117 points | 28 comments)
7. Ask HN: How are you using LLMs for traversing decompiler output? (20 points | 11 comments)
8. Hacking yourself a satellite – recovering BEESAT-1 [video] (47 points | 2 comments)
9. Self driving 1993 Volvo with open pilot (431 points | 104 comments)
10. Show HN: Signify – FOSS tool to generate Email signatures (HTML and PNG) (3 points | 1 comment)

13. Don't Clobber the Frame Pointer (9 points | discuss)
14. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring Solutions Engineers ( | hide)

20. Breaking Up with Long Tasks or: how I learned to group loops and wield the yield (164 points | 57 comments)
21. US newspapers are deleting old crime stories, offering subjects a 'clean slate' (108 points | 185 comments)
22. Show HN: I completed shipping my desktop app (462 points | 249 comments)
23. Meta is killing off its AI-powered Instagram and Facebook profiles (187 points | 293 comments)
24. B-Trees: More Than I Thought I'd Want to Know (256 points | 13 comments)
25. Parasitic worms 'manipulate' mantises onto asphalt roads, say researchers (122 points | 91 comments)
26. Yemeni Coffee Shops in Texas (178 points | 139 comments)
27. "AI" on a Calculator: Part 1 (34 points | 11 comments)
28. Do Files want to be Actors? (87 points | 57 comments)
29. F-Droid Fake Signer PoC (213 points | 72 comments)
